Title: Relates to rotary and roundabout use and safety awareness
Summary: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish the "rotary and roundabout use and safety awareness" component for the pre-licensing class as a prerequisite for obtaining a license to operate a motor vehicle.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to rotary and roundabout use and safety awareness in the pre-licensing course
